Two Examples of How DNA Sequencing Technology Can Be Useful for People

Example 1: Personalized Medicine

With the ability to sequence an individual's DNA, doctors can create personalized treatment plans based on the patient's unique genetic makeup. This can lead to more effective treatments with fewer side effects.

Example 2: Forensic Science

DNA sequencing technology has revolutionized the field of forensic science. By analyzing DNA left at crime scenes, investigators can identify suspects and exonerate innocent individuals with unprecedented accuracy.
